sentences.en: Disease is disgruntled , resemble basking in damp - dry fade aubergine.
sentences.cn: 病怏怏的, 像晒半干的蔫茄子.

sentences.en: Disgruntled and defeated omnibus owners and drivers groaned aloud.
sentences.cn: 心怀不满的和遭受挫折的公共马车商人和车夫高声叫骂着.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE: The company's disgruntled employees felt underpaid and unappreciated; they never showed enthusiasm for their work.
sentences.cn: 这家公司心怀不满的员工觉得薪酬过低,且得不到赏识; 他们对工作毫无热情.

sentences.en: He was disgruntled at their absence.
I could see that, if not actually disgruntled , he was far form being grunted.
sentences.cn: 我是可以看到, 如果不是实在不高兴, 他完全不会咕哝的.

sentences.en: I left feeling disgruntled at the way I'd been treated.
sentences.cn: 我受到如此对待因而愤然离去。

sentences.en: It's inevitable that there will be the occasional disgruntled customer.
sentences.cn: 偶尔会出现对你的服务不满意的客户,这是不可避免的.

sentences.en: Mary is still disgruntled about missing the party.
sentences.cn: 玛丽对于错过那次派对内心仍感到不满的.

sentences.en: She's still disgruntled about missing the party.
sentences.cn: 她因错过了这一聚会而仍耿耿于怀.

sentences.en: Tanaka, " is a disgruntled former Japanese tourism official. "
sentences.cn: Tanaka 识别, 是一位气恼的前任观光官员.

sentences.en: The employees were disgruntled by their bad working conditions.
sentences.cn: 员工对他们恶劣的工作条件颇有怨言.

sentences.en: The models stalking the catwalk at a fashion show I attended looked equally disgruntled.
sentences.cn: 在我参加的一场时装秀上,T台上 渐行渐近的模特们看起来也是满腹怨言的样子.

sentences.en: This may expose them to lawsuits from disgruntled investors.
sentences.cn: 这可能让它们与心怀不满的投资者对簿公堂.

sentences.en: Today many businessmen in and around the capital are disgruntled.
sentences.cn: 现在,许多首都内外的商人们开始不高兴了.

sentences.en: Today many businessmen in and around the capital disgruntled.
sentences.cn: 而现在许多首都以及首都周围的生意人却很不满意.

trans.tran_en: annoyed or disappointed, especially because things have not happened in the way that you wanted
